biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Brent Maddock is a writer/director who has worked on several high profile projects like Short Circuit, Tremors, and Wild Wild West. Maddock's writing partner is S.S. Wilson.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Brent Maddock, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
